com.giniality.education.webappframework.registry

Class ViewRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giniality.education.webappframework.registry.ViewRegistry

  • public class ViewRegistry
extends Object
    Registry to store instances of the View class with their alias name.
    Author:
    Christian Sauer (CSA), Giniality AG

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Finds the view belonging to the given alias name.
      String getAliasNameForClass(Class inViewClass)
      Gets the alias name of the given View class.
      static ViewRegistry getInstance()
      Gets the instance of this registry.

      Registers the given view using its alias name.

        Gets the instance of this registry.

        Registers the given view using its alias name.

      • findView

        public View findView(String inAliasName)
        Finds the view belonging to the given alias name.
        Parameters:
        inAliasName - The alias name.
        Returns:
